projectId.title: GCP Project ID
projectId.description: Project that owns the Security Command Center resources.

audience.title: STS Audience
audience.description: Audience used when exchanging the subject token with Google STS.

serviceAccountEmail.title: Target Service Account
serviceAccountEmail.description: Service account email to impersonate for SCC calls.

organizationId.title: Organization ID
organizationId.description: GCP organization to scope SCC queries.

sourceId.title: SCC Source ID
sourceId.description: Optional SCC source identifier (e.g. organizations/123/sources/456) to scope findings.

scopes.title: Additional OAuth Scopes
scopes.description: Optional extra OAuth scopes requested when impersonating the target service account.

tokenLifetime.title: Access Token Lifetime
tokenLifetime.description: Optional access token lifetime (Go duration, e.g. 3600s).

audienceHint.title: Audience Override
audienceHint.description: Optional audience override if multiple STS exchanges are supported.

workloadPoolProject.title: Workload Identity Project
workloadPoolProject.description: Optional project that owns the workload identity pool when different from projectId.

findingFilter.title: Findings Filter
findingFilter.description: Optional CEL filter applied when querying SCC findings.
